metadata.title: CVE-2022-4055 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: When xdg-mail is configured to use thunderbird for mailto URLs, improperparsing of the URL can lead to additional headers being passed tothunderbird that should not be included per RFC 2368. An attacker can usethis method to create a mailto URL that looks safe to users, but willactually attach files when clicked.

criterions.comment: xdg-utils package in esm-infra/bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-01-03').
